venue.address_1: 107 South St, Ste 6A (btw South Station & Chinatown)
venue.name: David Buck's Loft

item.description:
Feeling OVERwhelmed?....even with all the good stuff that you're attracting? Struggling with day-to-day time management? Not enjoying a more authentic & harmonious lifestyle?

Pam Kristan, Boston LoA member & author/teacher/consultant, will help us dig down to root issues of Attention, Boundaries, & Choices -- the ABCs -- to cultivate a more “attractive” new way to manage time & allow for better possibilities.

You’ll learn fresh insights & practical techniques to

-- keep your Attention focused in the face of distractions,
-- establish firm yet flexible task Boundaries, &
-- make Choices in line with your desires.

Join us & discover wonderful ways to wrap up 2010 & enjoy the festive months of November & December... being UNDERwhelmed!

**********************************************************
About Pam Kristan
email: pam@pamelakristan.com
phone: 617-522-4956

Pamela Kristan, author of Awakening In Time: Practical Time Management for Those On a Spiritual Path & The Spirit of Getting Organized, teaches & consults in spiritually-oriented time & "stuff" management. She has moderated speak-outs for the first two National Take Back Your Time Days.

**********************************************************
RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming.
We usually provide handouts & have appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up. Many of you have been wonderful with this & we very much appreciate your understanding & support!

**************************************************************
For parking and directions (via T or driving) info to Dave's loft :
(1) Go here: http://www.meetup.com...
(2) Sign in
(3) Scroll down and open file "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Discover the Law Of Attraction Way of Being "Under"-whelmed
